attr.title: Rise of the Penguins 2
attr.desc: Penguin's Dark Ascent: Rise of the Penguins 2 - A dark and challenging 2D platformer adventure where you guide penguins through treacherous environments, battle fierce enemies and bosses, and uncover a mysterious story. Features multiple levels, boss battles, inventories, and rich storytelling.
attr.inst: Ready to run. No additional files needed. Game includes full controller support.
